lib/hope/components/link_holder/link_holder_tuple.h

00008 
00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include "hope/typelist/type_list.h"
00012 #include "hope/tuple/flat_tuple.h"
00013 
00014 namespace hope {
00015 
00016     template<
00017         template<typename> typename InnerHolderPolicy,
00018         typename... Links
00019     >
00020     class link_holder_tuple final {
00021     public:
00022         using links_t = flat_tuple<InnerHolderPolicy<Links>...>;
00023 
00024         link_holder_tuple() = default;
00025         ~link_holder_tuple() = default;
00026 
00027         template <typename T, typename NativeT = std::decay_t<T>>
00028         [[nodiscard]] constexpr decltype(auto) get() const noexcept {
00029             return get_impl<NativeT>();
00030         }
00031 
00032         template <typename T>
00033         bool add(T* link) noexcept {
00034             if (link == nullptr)
00035                 return false;
00036 
00037             bool added = false;
00038             for_each(links, [&](auto&& field) {
00039                 if (added) return;
00040                 added = field.add(link);
00041             });
00042             return added;
00043         }
00044 
00045         template <typename T>
00046         bool remove(T* link) noexcept {
00047             if (link == nullptr) 
00048                 return false;
00049 
00050             bool removed = false;
00051             for_each(links, [&](auto&& field) {
00052                 if (removed) return;
00053                 removed = field.remove(link);
00054             });
00055             return removed;
00056         }
00057 
00058         link_holder_tuple(const link_holder_tuple&) = delete;
00059         link_holder_tuple(link_holder_tuple&&) = delete;
00060         link_holder_tuple& operator=(const link_holder_tuple&) = delete;
00061         link_holder_tuple& operator=(link_holder_tuple&&) = delete;
00062     private:
00063 
00064         template <typename T>
00065         [[nodiscard]] constexpr decltype(auto) get_impl() const noexcept {
00066             static_assert(contains<T>(types));
00067             return links.template get<InnerHolderPolicy<T>>().get();
00068         }
00069 
00070         constexpr static type_list<Links...> types{ };
00071 
00072         links_t links{ };
00073     };
00074 }
